name: The Death Masochist
description:
This game was made for the GameDev.TV Game Jam 2022. The theme was 'Death is only the beginning'.

This was my first Game Jam and so I kept the game relatively simple. The objective of the game is to die in every possible way in each level and then to reach the flag.

Source code: https://github.com/kindred008/Death-is-only-the-beginning

Assets used:

- https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-adventure-1

- https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-adventure-2

- https://opengameart.org/content/free-ui-asset-pack-1
